name: Hidden Annihilator
description:
Hidden Annihilator is a first-person horror survival game while you can play from the Annihilator's view in the first level and after you pass the level now you are playing and trying to escape from abandoned hospital before getting killed or the timer ends.

  • CONTROLS OF THE GAME

Walking: You can use W A S D keys to run in vertical or horizontal way.

Running: Press SHIFT key to sprint. Especially recommended in 2nd Level.

To Collect Key: Just press ‘K’ to collect the hidden keys.

To Open Doors: Press ‘C’ to open doors.

To Escape from The Hospital: After you collect 8 keys go to the end and after, just press ‘E’.

How to Play the Game?

As a villain your main goal is to defeat all person in the house before their complete their objective and reach the exit to do that you can start walking with using ‘WASD’ keys or sprint with using both ‘WASD’ and ‘Shift’ keys. After, scare them by pressing ‘V’ key and after 3 scares the person dies and you get points if you reach to kill all of them you will be able to pass 2nd level. You get 10 points for each scare and 50 points for killing the person.

In the second level you are now playing from the players aspect and your main goal is to collect 8 keys and reach the exit without get killed by annihilator or before end of the time. In the 2nd level we recommended that the ‘Shift’ key. Because you don’t have much time to find all the keys… Also, your health decreased about %5 each time you collide with annihilator.
